DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select§§n Convert(varchar, UA.LoginDateTime, 103) as [LoginDate],§§n SubString(Convert(varchar, UA.LoginDateTime, 8), 1, 5) as [LoginTime],§§n Convert(varchar, UA.LogoutDateTime, 103) as [LogoutDate],§§n SubString(Convert(varchar, UA.LogoutDateTime, 8), 1, 5) as [LogoutTime],§§n DateDiff(minute, UA.LoginDateTime, UA.LogoutDateTime) as SessionMinutes,§§n UsrLogin.UserName,§§n UsrEmail.UserName as [LoginEmail],§§n A.DisplayName [User],§§n UA.ProductCount,§§n UA.TransactionCount,§§n Cast(UA.TotalSelectionTime as float)/10 as [TotalSelectionTime (Sec)],§§n Cast(UA.TotalPaymentTime as float)/10 as [TotalPaymentTime (Sec)],§§n Cast(UA.TotalPrintTime as float)/10 as [TotalPrintTime (Sec)],§§n Cast(UA.TotalSelectionTime+UA.TotalPaymentTime+UA.TotalPrintTime as float)/10 as [TotalTransactionTime (Sec)],§§n W.WorkstationCode,§§n W.WorkstationName,§§n OPA.AccountCode OpAreaCode,§§n OPA.DisplayName OpAreaName,§§n Loc.AccountCode LocationCode,§§n Loc.DisplayName LocationName§§nfrom§§n tbUserActivity UA left join§§n tbAccount A on A.AccountId=UA.UserAccountId left join§§n tbWorkstation W on UA.WorkstationId=W.WorkstationId left join§§n tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=W.OpAreaAccountId left join§§n tbAccount Loc on Loc.AccountId=W.LocationAccountId left join§§n tbLoginAlias UsrLogin on UsrLogin.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrLogin.LoginAliasType=0 left join§§n tbLoginAlias UsrEmail on UsrEmail.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrEmail.LoginAliasType=1§§nwhere§§n UA.FiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n UA.FiscalDate<=:@DateTo and§§n (:@WorkstationId is null or W.WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId) and§§n (:@OpAreaId is null or W.OpAreaAccountId=:@OpAreaId) and§§n (:@LocationId is null or W.LocationAccountId=:@LocationId) and§§n (:@UserId is null or UA.UserAccountId=:@UserId)
